She's applied to over 40 positions, aiming for a managerial role that offers more strategic input and career advancement. She's confident in her skills but wants to refine her interview techniques to stand out in a competitive market and ensure she lands a role with good growth prospects.
feedbackStyle: Maria will give direct and concise feedback, focusing on the practical utility of the system's suggestions.
